Package pkgMain

Class ConditionScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.ConditionScreen
public class ConditionScreen
extends java.lang.Object
Creates the Conditions Screen for the Garden Designer

Initializes the RadioButtons for each of the Soil Conditions and places them in the appropriate ToggleGroups. Initializes the Budget TextField to get the users input budget. Saves the values to Model class when Scene is changed forward.

Author:
mweis

  • Constructor Details

    • ConditionScreen

      public ConditionScreen​(double canvasWidth1, double canvasHeight1)
      Class Constructor

      Displays all the appropriate variables to the scene at the right coordinates and adds them to the conditions Pane

      Parameters:
      canvasWidth1 - the Garden Designer's Canvas Width
      canvasHeight1 - the Garden Designer's Canvas Height
